long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Imprivata Privileged Access Management broker browser extension is an optional browser proxy configuration agent for Imprivata Privileged Access Management WEB Broker providing high-trust access to WEB portals without revealing access credentials to an end user.

In addition to this, the Imprivata Privileged Access Management broker browser extension serves as an optional client side password management and login filler integrated with the system Identity Vault to simplify the user login experience to web portals.

The Imprivata Privileged Access Management broker browser Extension will provide you access to your secrets and records that are securely stored in the system Identity Vault so they can be easily populated into web login portals.

This extension can be used by any Imprivata Privileged Access Management users who have stored records and the appropriate permissions to them. With the extension, users can easily access WEB portals though Imprivata Privileged Access Management Broker or populate credentials for web login forms directly in their browser with a single click.
